title: Getting a Gemini API key is an exercise in frustration
summary:
The author recounts a frustrating experience trying to obtain a paid Gemini 3 Pro API key for a side project. Initially, confusion arose from the overloaded "Gemini" name, which refers to numerous Google products and services. While creating an API key in Google AI Studio was straightforward, setting up billing proved to be a labyrinthine process.

This involved navigating the Google Cloud Console, creating a billing account, associating it with a project, and adding a payment method. Google then demanded further intrusive payment verification, requiring a government ID and a partially redacted credit card image, which was initially rejected due to an unstated PNG file format requirement. After being told verification would take "a few days," it completed surprisingly quickly.

However, subsequent attempts to use the Gemini 3 Pro model via Gemini CLI, direct API calls, or Google AI Studio's Playground resulted in persistent 403 "PERMISSION_DENIED" errors. Mysteriously, a final email from Google confirming the billing account was "in good standing" resolved all the issues.

The author concludes the entire ordeal was a "waste of time," highlighting that Google's complex, bureaucratic system is designed for large organizations, not individual developers. This contrasts sharply with the simpler, more developer-friendly processes of competitors like Anthropic and OpenAI. Despite finally gaining access, the frustrating experience has significantly reduced the author's willingness to use Gemini unless it proves a massive improvement over alternatives.
chinese_title: 获取 Gemini API 密钥是一个令人抓狂的过程。
chinese_summary:
作者讲述了为一项副业项目获取付费版Gemini 3 Pro API密钥的一次令人沮丧的经历。起初，困惑源于“Gemini”这个名称的过度使用，它指代了众多谷歌产品和服务。在Google AI Studio中创建API密钥很直接，但设置账单却是一个错综复杂的过程。

这包括了导航谷歌云控制台（Google Cloud Console），创建账单账户，将其与一个项目关联，并添加支付方式。谷歌随后要求进行更具侵入性的支付验证，需要政府颁发的身份证件和一张部分遮蔽的信用卡图片。这张图片最初因未声明的PNG文件格式要求而被拒绝。在被告知验证需要“几天”后，它却出人意料地迅速完成了。

然而，随后通过Gemini CLI、直接API调用或Google AI Studio的Playground尝试使用Gemini 3 Pro模型时，却持续遭遇403“权限不足”（PERMISSION_DENIED）错误。神秘的是，谷歌发送的一封最终确认账单账户“状态良好”（in good standing）的电子邮件解决了所有问题。

作者总结称，整个磨难是“浪费时间”，并指出谷歌复杂、官僚的系统是为大型组织而非个人开发者设计的。这与Anthropic和OpenAI等竞争对手更简单、更对开发者友好的流程形成了鲜明对比。尽管最终获得了访问权限，但这次令人沮丧的经历已大大降低了作者使用Gemini的意愿，除非它能证明比其他替代方案有巨大的改进。

title: Patterns.dev
summary:
Patterns.dev offers a comprehensive guide to various development patterns across JavaScript, React, and Vue.js, alongside crucial performance optimization techniques.

The **JavaScript Patterns** section covers foundational design patterns like Singleton, Proxy, Prototype, Observer, Module, Mixin, Mediator, Flyweight, and Factory, relevant for plain JavaScript and Node.js. It also extensively details loading and performance optimization, including animating view transitions, strategic imports (Static, Dynamic, On Visibility, On Interaction), bundle splitting methods (Route Based Splitting), the PRPL pattern, Tree Shaking, Preload/Prefetch, third-party script optimization, list virtualization, and JavaScript compression.

**React Patterns** focuses on React and Next.js, introducing both frameworks. It explores key component patterns such as Container/Presentational, Higher-Order Components (HOC), Render Props, Hooks, and Compound Components. Rendering strategies are explained, including Client-side, Server-side, Static, Incremental Static Generation (ISG), Progressive Hydration, Streaming SSR, and React Server Components. Optimization for Core Web Vitals and modern React Stack Patterns are also discussed.

**Vue Patterns** provides an introduction to Vue-specific approaches. It covers component types like Async and Dynamic Components, Renderless Components, and the use of Composables for logic reuse. Data management patterns like Data Provider and Provide/Inject are discussed, alongside programmatic rendering with Render Functions and the `<script setup>` syntax for the Composition API. State management within Vue is also a key topic.
chinese_title: 模式.dev
chinese_summary:
Patterns.dev提供涵盖JavaScript、React和Vue.js各种开发模式的全面指南，以及重要的性能优化技术。

“JavaScript模式”部分涵盖单例模式、代理模式、原型模式、观察者模式、模块模式、混入模式、中介者模式、享元模式和工厂模式等基础设计模式，这些模式适用于纯JavaScript和Node.js。它还详细介绍了加载和性能优化，包括视图过渡动画、策略性导入（静态、动态、可见时、交互时）、包拆分方法（基于路由的拆分）、PRPL模式、Tree Shaking、预加载/预获取、第三方脚本优化、列表虚拟化和JavaScript压缩。

“React模式”侧重于React和Next.js，并介绍了这两个框架。它探讨了容器/展示组件、高阶组件（HOC）、Render Props、Hooks和复合组件等关键组件模式。渲染策略也得到了阐述，包括客户端渲染、服务器端渲染、静态渲染、增量静态生成（ISG）、渐进式注水、流式SSR和React服务器组件。Core Web Vitals优化和现代React堆栈模式也进行了讨论。

“Vue模式”介绍了Vue特有的方法。它涵盖了异步组件和动态组件、无渲染组件等组件类型，以及使用Composables实现逻辑复用。数据管理模式，如数据提供者（Data Provider）和提供/注入（Provide/Inject），也进行了讨论，同时介绍了使用渲染函数进行编程式渲染以及用于组合式API的`<script setup>`语法。Vue中的状态管理也是一个关键主题。

title: Nokia N900 Necromancy
summary:
The article details the ambitious resurrection of a friend's classic Nokia N900. Faced with a dead device and concerns about unreliable old batteries, the author embarked on a project to build a custom power solution. Initially, a prototype using large supercapacitors and resistors successfully booted the device. This led to creating a compact 'battery' pack from ten smaller supercapacitors, which fit into the original battery compartment and was externally powered.

However, during experimentation, the device's internal OS was corrupted (requiring booting from an SD card), and a subsequent attempt to power the custom battery via the N900’s fragile micro-USB port resulted in the irreversible damage of the mainboard's crucial +5V pad, disabling original USB functionality.

Undeterred, the author performed a 'radical replacement,' custom-fitting a USB-C port into the N900’s chassis. Due to space constraints, this new port was wired only for basic +5V power (0.5A, no data or Power Delivery), requiring 'dumb' USB-A-to-USB-C cables. The project culminated in a 3D-printed housing that incorporated a large capacitor, a voltage-dropping diode, and the original battery's Battery Control Module (BCM), connecting directly to the new USB-C port. The N900 now successfully boots from an SD card, powers via its new USB-C port, and enjoys a new life as an online radio device, demonstrating a creative solution to hardware limitations.
chinese_title: 诺基亚N900魔改
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者雄心勃勃地修复朋友的经典诺基亚N900手机的经历。面对设备报废和旧电池不可靠的问题，作者着手设计并构建一个定制的电源解决方案。最初，一个使用大型超级电容器和电阻的原型成功启动了设备。这促使他用十个小型超级电容器制作了一个紧凑的“电池”组，该电池组可以放入原电池仓并由外部供电。

然而，在实验过程中，设备的内部操作系统损坏了（需要从SD卡启动）。随后，一次尝试通过N900脆弱的micro-USB端口为定制电池供电的操作，导致主板上关键的+5V焊盘受到不可逆的损坏，从而使原始USB功能失效。

作者并未因此却步，而是进行了一次“彻底的替换”，定制了一个USB-C端口并将其安装到N900的机身中。由于空间限制，这个新端口仅用于基本的+5V供电（0.5A，不具备数据传输或电力传输功能），因此需要使用普通的USB-A转USB-C线缆。该项目最终完成了一个3D打印外壳，该外壳整合了一个大型电容器、一个降压二极管以及原电池的电池控制模块（BCM），并直接连接到新的USB-C端口。现在，N900能够成功地从SD卡启动，通过其新的USB-C端口供电，并以一台在线收音设备的形式获得了新生，这展示了解决硬件限制的创造性方案。

title: Programmers and software developers lost the plot on naming their tools
summary:
The author contends that software developers have strayed from descriptive naming conventions for their tools and libraries, favoring arbitrary names inspired by random nouns, mythology, or fictional characters. This trend, highlighted by Richard Stallman's call for "memorable names" reflecting function, contrasts sharply with other engineering fields like civil or chemical engineering, where names inherently convey purpose (e.g., "Golden Gate Bridge," "2,2,4-trimethylpentane").

Historically, early software tools (grep, sed) and languages (FORTRAN, SQL) also employed descriptive naming. However, around the 2010s, a cultural shift towards quirky, then increasingly meaningless names (e.g., Viper, Cobra, Melody, Casbin) emerged, possibly fueled by open-source and startup culture.

This practice exacts a "cognitive tax" on developers, forcing them to waste mental effort deciphering obscure names rather than focusing on actual problems or system architecture. This accumulated effort hinders onboarding and debugging, making tasks like explaining infrastructure unnecessarily complex.

The author refutes common justifications: marketing isn't relevant for libraries, clarity outweighs "boring," "fun" has negative externalities, and name collisions can be solved with namespaces or prefixes.

The solution proposed is a cultural correction: a return to professional standards through social pressure and education. Developers should prioritize clarity, naming libraries by function, using compound terms, and embracing verbosity. Creative names should be reserved for end-user products or mascots, while infrastructure tools demand descriptive names. The guiding question should be: "Would a civil engineer name a bridge support system this way?" Emphasizing clarity demonstrates respect for users' time and cognitive resources.
chinese_title: 程序员和软件开发者给工具命名已经离谱了。
chinese_summary:
作者认为，软件开发者已经偏离了其工具和库的描述性命名规范，转而倾向于受随机名词、神话或虚构角色启发的任意命名。这一趋势，正如理查德·斯托曼呼吁使用反映功能的“易记名称”所强调的，与其他工程领域（如土木工程或化学工程）形成鲜明对比，后者的名称本身就能传达其目的（例如，“金门大桥”、“2,2,4-三甲基戊烷”）。

历史上，早期的软件工具（如grep、sed）和编程语言（如FORTRAN、SQL）也采用了描述性命名。然而，大约在2010年代，出现了一种文化转变，先是倾向于古怪的，然后是越来越没有意义的名称（例如Viper、Cobra、Melody、Casbin），这种转变可能由开源和创业文化所推动。

这种做法给开发者带来了“认知税”，迫使他们浪费精力解读晦涩的名称，而非专注于实际问题或系统架构。这种累积的精力消耗阻碍了新员工的入职和调试，使解释基础设施等任务变得不必要的复杂。

作者驳斥了常见的理由：营销与库无关；清晰度比“无趣”更重要；“趣味性”带来负面外部性；命名冲突可以通过命名空间或前缀解决。

提出的解决方案是一种文化纠正：通过社会压力和教育回归专业标准。开发者应优先考虑清晰性，按功能命名库，使用复合词，并接受冗长。创造性名称应保留给最终用户产品或吉祥物，而基础设施工具则需要描述性名称。指导性问题应该是：“一位土木工程师会这样命名一个桥梁支撑系统吗？”强调清晰度体现了对用户时间与认知资源的尊重。

title: Rivian Unveils Custom Silicon, R2 Lidar Roadmap, and Universal Hands Free
summary:
Rivian's Autonomy and AI Day unveiled the company's ambitious strategy for self-driving, focusing on custom hardware, AI, and a unified data platform.

A key announcement was the Rivian Autonomy Processor (RAP1), their first in-house 5nm multi-chip module. Delivering 1600 sparse INT8 TOPS, RAP1 powers the new Gen 3 Autonomy Computer (ACM3), signaling Rivian's shift to designing its own silicon. The ACM3 will debut on the R2 platform in late 2026. While R2 will launch initially without LiDAR, Rivian confirmed it will be integrated later to complement cameras and radar for a richer perception stack.

Rivian's autonomy stack is driven by a self-improving Large Driving Model, trained similarly to an LLM, with a trajectory aiming for point-to-point, eyes-off, and eventual personal Level 4 autonomy.

For current owners, a major software update will bring Universal Hands Free to Gen 2 R1T and R1S, covering over 3.5 million miles of roads in the US and Canada.

Rivian also announced Autonomy+, a new subscription tier launching early 2026 for $2,500 one-time or $49.99/month. This feature remains with the vehicle upon ownership transfer.

Further enhancing the ownership experience, Rivian is reorganizing its platform around "Rivian Unified Intelligence," a data foundation for predictive maintenance and AI tools. The Rivian Assistant, a next-generation voice experience with text messaging capabilities, will arrive in early 2026 for Gen 1 and Gen 2 R1 vehicles, with an offline version for R2. Additionally, AI will be embedded into service and diagnostics workflows for faster, more accurate issue resolution.
chinese_title: Rivian发布定制芯片、R2激光雷达路线图以及通用免手
chinese_summary:
Rivian自动驾驶与人工智能日公布了该公司雄心勃勃的自动驾驶战略，该战略侧重于定制硬件、人工智能和统一数据平台。

一项重要发布是Rivian自动驾驶处理器(RAP1)，这是他们的首款自研5纳米多芯片模块。RAP1可提供1600稀疏INT8 TOPS算力，为全新第三代自动驾驶计算机(ACM3)提供动力，标志着Rivian转向自主设计芯片。ACM3将于2026年末在R2平台上首次亮相。尽管R2最初发布时没有激光雷达，但Rivian证实未来会集成激光雷达，以补充摄像头和雷达，打造更丰富的感知堆栈。

Rivian的自动驾驶堆栈由一个自我改进的大型驾驶模型驱动，该模型类似于大型语言模型(LLM)进行训练，其发展轨迹旨在实现点对点、免视以及最终的个人L4级自动驾驶。

对于现有车主，一项重大软件更新将为第二代R1T和R1S带来“通用免手持”功能，该功能将覆盖美国和加拿大超过350万英里的道路。

Rivian还宣布了Autonomy+，一个新的订阅级别，将于2026年初推出，费用为一次性2500美元或每月49.99美元。该功能在所有权转让后仍随车辆保留。

为进一步提升拥车体验，Rivian正在围绕“Rivian统一智能”重组其平台，这是一个用于预测性维护和人工智能工具的数据基础。Rivian助手，一款具备短信功能的下一代语音体验，将于2026年初面向第一代和第二代R1车型推出，R2车型将提供离线版本。此外，人工智能将嵌入到服务和诊断工作流程中，以实现更快、更准确的问题解决。
